Smart Power Strip: A power strip with built-in Wi-Fi connectivity and a smartphone app that allows users to control and monitor their devices remotely. Users can turn on/off, schedule, and receive notifications for their devices from anywhere using their smartphone.

Power Strip with USB-C Charging Ports: A power strip with multiple USB-C charging ports that can charge multiple devices at the same time. This is ideal for people who use multiple devices and need to charge them quickly and efficiently.

Power Strip with Built-In Surge Protector: A power strip with a built-in surge protector that provides additional protection against power surges and spikes. This is especially useful for people who live in areas prone to power outages or have sensitive electronics that require extra protection.

Power Strip with Automatic Shut-Off: A power strip with an automatic shut-off feature that turns off the strip when it detects that all devices are turned off. This is useful for people who want to save energy and reduce their carbon footprint.

Power Strip with Integrated Night Light: A power strip with an integrated night light that provides soft, ambient lighting in the dark. This is ideal for people who want to save energy by reducing the need for separate night lights in their home.
